title: Letterhead Fonts
content:
Is the Letterhead Fonts' site down? Anyone know why?

[www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112054548/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "www.letterheadfonts.com")
author: j_polo9

comments.content: Oh I deeply hope it wasn't snatched by a squatter upon registration expiry.

when i checked the site after reading this message, i noticed they had this notice up:

_We wanted to add a few things to the new shopping cart in order to make it easier to use. Probably be finished by Friday. Thanks for your patience. We'll make it worth your wait._
oh cool. Where did you see the message? When i went it was just a godaddy holder page as if the domain was expired. Now nothing loads for me not even a 404.
k it's back. But they still don't have a lettersetter for testing the type :|
